title: Ejercicios: Creaci√≥n y Control de Presupuestos

items.prompt: If expenses are higher than the budget, there is a ___.
items.explanation: A shortfall occurs when there isn't enough money.

items.prompt: Our cash flow is ___ than last month.
items.explanation: Better is the comparative of good.

items.prompt: Rent and electricity are examples of ___ costs.
items.explanation: Overhead costs are general business expenses.

items.prompt: This is the ___ quarter of the year for sales.
items.explanation: Worst is the superlative of bad.

items.prompt: Which term refers to the money moving in and out of a business?
items.explanation: Cash flow tracks the movement of money.
